scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && USE_SQLITE=1 python manage.py runserver
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run install:all
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.start: npm run start:frontend & npm run start:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && USE_SQLITE=1 python manage.py runserver
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.migrate: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && USE_SQLITE=1 python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && USE_SQLITE=1 python manage.py makemigrations
